CustomField.description: This is the email of the _first_ owner of the team. Now that we have multiple team owners, this owner email isn't 100% accurate but is useful for giving a thread to pull on.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the email of the _first_ owner of the team. Now that we have multiple team owners, this owner email isn't 100% accurate but is useful for giving a thread to pull on.
CustomField.label: Team owner email
